alert.note: Alert for Kings; New York (Manhattan); Queens; Suffolk; Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:49AM EDT until August 13 at 3:15AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL WESTCHESTER...QUEENS...BRONX...WESTERN SUFFOLK... KINGS...NEW YORK (MANHATTAN) AND NASSAU COUNTIES... At 248 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Tappan to Great Neck to 9 miles east of Highlands, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. These severe storms will be near... Freeport and Valley Stream around 255 AM EDT. Levittown and Plainview around 300 AM EDT. Huntington Station and Massapequa around 305 AM EDT. Amityville and Centerport around 310 AM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
